title: [Large-scale] Community of Inquiry (CoI)-Based Instructional Design Course for Online Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of nursing practice experience and foundational nursing theory knowledge
context.additional_context: Educational course requiring the combination of real-time interaction and self-directed learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the social, teaching, and cognitive presence concepts of the CoI (Community of Inquiry) framework to online nursing education.
Learners can build a professional nursing knowledge-sharing community using Zoom-based discussion and collaboration tools.
Learners can evaluate the appropriateness of CoI elements in online instructional design with over 80% accuracy through formative assessments.

resources: Zoom Account and Real-Time Session Management System
LMS (Learning Management System) or Collaborative Platforms (e.g., Miro, Padlet)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
